title: LeaverBuster Notification Appeared, but no long queue and I haven't left any recent games
body:
I logged onto to league today after a small update, and the leaver buster notification appeared. 

The problem is that I
- Haven't been disconnected from a game for months
-Tested a game and it did not put me in a longer queue

Yesterday however, my client did crash (or my computer crashed or both), but I got back on in a couple minutes. That is the most recent thing.

In the past, I have had internet problems and disconnected which gave me the leaverbuster.

So, my question is why did I receive the leaverbuster notification, and if it is true, why wasn't I placed in a waiting queue?
Thanks.

replies.body: I took a look into this for you and was unable to find any notices about leaverbuster on the account.  Were you able to grab a screenshot by chance of what that notification said?  I'm guessing that, if anything, it's the notification that appears to say thanks for staying in game and returning to a good standing.  Everything looks okay to me, so I hope that helps!

I wasn't able to grab a screenshot, it faded away. It said leaverbuster however.
Thanks for the feedback.
